original_text: So he covered everything inside the whole temple with gold. That included the altar that was inside the Most Holy Place.
korean_text: 온 성전을 금으로 입히기를 마치고 내소에 속한 제단의 전부를 금으로 입혔더라

sentences.original_text: So he covered everything inside the whole temple with gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 온 성전 안의 모든 것을 금으로 덮었다

sentences.original_text: that was inside the Most Holy Place
